import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Github, Linkedin, Phone, Mail, MapPin, Send } from 'lucide-react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); // Reset form setFormData({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); alert('Thank you for your message! I\'ll get back to you soon.'); }; return (
